issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Hi,

yesterday I have updated my NEXUS5 and since this time  the start screen will scrumpled like on this shreen:
Android 6.0.1 Coreversion from 2016-02-10


!http://i.imgur.com/S08aEvv.png!

Now I removed all code in my app.js and I think in this case the app should
 show only my default.png, but I see the version from the screenshot.
fields.summary: Android 6.0.1 with API21 crashes the splash screen

comments.body: Hello, The issue is not reproducible with android 6.0.1 in Nexus 7. What version of Ti SDK are you using? Try with SDK 5.1.2.GA. Also, it could be because of your custom splash screen. The image might be corrupted. Try changing the splash screen image. Thanks.
I'm using SDK5.1.2.GA and the issue appears since updating of NEXUS5. I will try to update image. Now it is in 960x1600.

9 patch image should be used for splash screen to match different screen size and densities as recommended by google. If the graphics is not comparable with the screen size then such errors may be resulted. For better understanding please go through the documentation in the following link.

[link|http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Icons_and_Splash_Screens-section-29004897_IconsandSplashScreens-Splashscreens]
